long_description: With a stylish Mandarin collar and mesh side panels for venting, the women's Canari Ginerva Bike Jersey blends looks and performance so your ride is always a pleasure. Main body is 100% polyester for soft, moisture wicking comfort. Offers UPF 30 sun protection from harmful UV rays. Nylon/spandex side mesh panels stretch and vent to enhance your performance. Mandarin collar features contrast piping; symmetrical paisley design adorns front and back. Bonus center-back zippered pocket in addition to 3 tradtional back pockets. Canari Ginerva Bike Jersey for women features a close, next-to-skin pro fit.
short_description: With a stylish Mandarin collar and mesh side panels for venting, the women's Canari Ginerva Bike Jersey blends looks and performance so your ride is always a pleasure.
